column1: Morocco made history as they became the first African team to reach the World Cup semi-finals
column2: after a hard-fought victory over Portugal in Al Thumama. The Atlas Lions put on a defensive masterclass
column3: and En-Nesyri's header in the first half sealed the deal. Despite having to contend with several injuries
column4: they were cheered on by their passionate fans
column8: they will face either England or France in the semi-finals.
